luffy.description: Incredible figure of Luffy in his most powerful form, Nika the Sun God.

naruto.description: Naruto in Sage Mode, ready to face Pain. Includes Fukasaku and Shima.

goku.description: Goku has broken his limits once again. The ultimate form against Jiren.

vader.description: The iconic Sith Lord as he appeared in Episode IV. Light-up lightsaber feature.

zoro.description: Zoro unleashing his powerful nine-sword style technique, Ashura.

itachi.description: Itachi with his Akatsuki cloak, featuring interchangeable Mangekyo Sharingan eyes.

vegeta.description: The Prince of all Saiyans in his divine Super Saiyan Blue form.

boba.description: Boba Fett as he appears in The Mandalorian series, with his restored armor.
